Desc.entry: A chargeable service available to anyone aged 50 years and over, including those in receipt of individual budgets, who would like to purchase tailored support to combat social isolation. The clients Age Concern friend will be able to tailor a support package to the individuals need via support planning. Support could include visiting for a friendly chat, helping a client build confidence to access new social groups, accompanying clients visiting places of interest or appointments, sharing your interests or helping people to get their voice heard. The support is purchased in a package consisting of three 2 hour sessions delivered over a 6 week period. Please contact for further information.
